contentHtml:
PHP If Operators

Used to compare two values.

Comparison Operators

If statements have conditions that compare two values.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
<?php
    $x = 15;
    if ($x == 15) {
        echo "Nice!";
    }
?>
</body>

</html>

Logical Operators

Used to check more than one condition.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<body>
<?php
    $x = 15;
    $y = 12;
    $z = 10;

    if ($x > $y && $y > $z) {
        echo "Awesome!";
    }
?>
</body>

</html>
title: If Operators
